Clip.Title: TERROR IN THE SKIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Recent technical failures aboard commercial aircrafts are detailed through harrowing footage aboard the troubled flights and survivors' firsthand accounts.

Clip.Title: TERROR IN THE SKIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Passengers' videos show flights endangered by various forces of nature, and raise questions about how prepared we really are to fly against the elements.

Clip.Title: TERROR IN THE SKIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Footage from the cockpit and cabins of troubled planes shows how tiny cracks, loose bolts, and other small issues have caused big problems for airliners.

Clip.Title: TERROR IN THE SKIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Passengers' footage and cockpit recordings reveal how growing trends in pilot fatigue, stress, and boredom are jeopardizing flight safety.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of New Brunswick is an ecological wonder- this aerial survey soars above incredible rock formations, peat farms, and some of the East Coast's most impressive sand dunes.

Clip.Title: UNCOMMON COURAGE: BREAKOUT AT CHOSIN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of a brave and gutsy Marine who saved hundreds of lives during the Korean War.

Clip.Title: SEIZING JUSTICE: THE GREENSBORO 4
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Actress and Activist Anna Deavere Smith celebrates the 50th Anniversary of the Desegregation of Greensboro Woolworth Lunch Counter.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: British Columbia's Coastal Adventures truly begin where the road ends - north of Powell River - as we explore offshore islands, inland volcanoes, and forgotten World War II defense fortifications.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. Clip.Title: SHUTTLE DISCOVERY'S LAST MISSION
Clip.EpisodeSummary: With more than 27 years of service, the space shuttle Discovery has clocked more time in space than any other shuttle. She has flown more than 148 million miles, and has become one of the most storied spacecraft in American history. Join us as we celebrate her remarkable past and follow her final flight: to the Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum. It's an emotionally charged mission full of logistical challenges. Discovery is a robust, but very fragile aircraft, and getting her to D.C. in one piece will require some innovative engineering.
